TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteUrlExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 建立對應至所指定 URL 參數值的 URL。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified URL parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您設定為路由的 URL 的伺服器控制項的屬性，藉由提供的 URL 參數值的清單。The class makes it possible to set the property of a server control to the URL of a route by providing a list of URL parameter values. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立會產生具有格式化路由的 URL 超連結的標記。The following example shows how to create markup that generates a hyperlink with a URL that is formatted for a route. 使用定義的路由`http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}`作為 URL 模式。The route is defined by using `http://www.contoso.com/search/{searchterm}` as the URL pattern. ``` Search for Bicycles ``` 為此超連結會產生的 URL `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`。The URL generated for this hyperlink would be `http://www.contoso.com/search/Bicycles`. 如果 URL 參數提供給`RouteUrl`運算式的逸出序列並不足以唯一識別路由，您必須包含的路由名稱。If the URL parameters provided to the `RouteUrl` expression are not sufficient to uniquely identify a route, you must include the route name. 例如，如果 Web 應用程式有兩個路由與`searchterm`做為唯一的 URL 參數，路由就必須使用路由名稱，來定義和超連結標記會類似下列範例：For example, if a Web application has two routes with `searchterm` as the sole URL parameter, the routes would have to be defined by using route names, and the hyperlink markup would resemble the following example: ``` Search for Bicycles ```

span.span: ASP.NET Routing

related.span: 如何： 存取路由頁面中的 URL 參數

span.span: How to: Access URL Parameters in a Routed Page

Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (target As Object, entry As BoundPropertyEntry, parsedData As Object, context As ExpressionBuilderContext) As Object

span.span: Not used in this implementation.

param.span: 運算式要繫結到的屬性。

Not used in this implementation.
Properties for the control or page.

summary.span: 建立對應至所指定 URL 參數值以及路由 URL 格式的 URL。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified URL parameter values and to a route URL format.

returns.span: 對應至所指定 URL 參數值以及所選取路由的 URL。

span.span: The URL that corresponds to the specified URL parameter values and to the selected route.

returns.span: 此路由是透過比對路由 URL 模式與指定的參數清單所選取。

span.span: The route is selected by matching route URL patterns to the specified list of parameters.

returns.span: 如果有多個路由與指定的參數清單相符，也可以指定路由名稱表示要選取的路由。

span.span: In case more than one route matches a specified list of parameters, a route name can also be specified to indicate which route to select.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在標記中遇到下列形式的運算式時，ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法：ASP.NET calls this method when an expression of the following form is encountered in markup: `<%$ RouteUrl: urlparameter=value %>` 這個方法會產生適當的 URL，指定之索引鍵的路由值目前物件。This method generates the appropriate URL for the specified route-key values for the current object. 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 它會從取得`entry`參數的運算式繫結至控制項的參考，它會取得從`context`參數要評估的運算式，它會呼叫來產生 URL 的方法。It gets from the `entry` parameter a reference to the control to which the expression is bound, it gets from the `context` parameter the expression to be evaluated, and it calls the method to generate the URL.

summary.span: 傳回程式碼運算式，用來在產生的頁面類別中執行屬性指派。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.

returns.span: 用於屬性指派的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 建立頁面或控制項時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the CodeDOM is created for a page or control. 傳回的物件都代表將新增至產生的頁面類別中的屬性指派的程式碼運算式。The object that is returned represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

summary.span: 建立 URL，該 URL 對應至路由 URL 格式的指定路由索引鍵。

span.span: Creates a URL that corresponds to specified route keys for a route URL format.

returns.span: 對應至目前 物件之路由 URL 格式的 URL。

span.span: The URL that corresponds to the route URL format of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的 URL 產生適當的值，藉由呼叫方法的物件。This method generates the appropriate value for the URL by calling the method of the object. 它會取得物件從`control`參數，而它會剖析從路由名稱和路由參數`expression`參數。It gets the object from the `control` parameter, and it parses the route name and route parameters from the `expression` parameter.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 此方法無法剖析標記中指定的運算式。

span.span: The method was unable to parse the expression that was specified in markup.
For more information, see .

.property instance bool SupportsEvaluate
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsEvaluate : bool

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否可在未編譯的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已實作類別中，而且可在未編譯的頁面中傳回運算式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression in a page that is not compiled. 類別可以評估的運算式中不會經過編譯的頁面。The class can evaluate an expression in a page that is not compiled. 因此，屬性一律會傳回`true`。Therefore, the property always returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryParseRouteExpression (string expression, System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary routeValues, out string routeName);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryParseRouteExpression(string expression, class System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary routeValues, [out] string& routeName) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryParseRouteExpression (expression As String, routeValues As RouteValueDictionary, ByRef routeName As String) As Boolean
public: static bool TryParseRouteExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Web::Routing::RouteValueDictionary ^ routeValues, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % routeName);
static member TryParseRouteExpression : string * System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary * -> bool

span.span: The expression as specified in markup.

param.name: routeValues
param.span: 路由索引鍵及其相關值的集合。

span.span: The collection of route keys and their associated values.

param.name: routeName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，如果 包含名為 RouteName 的路由索引鍵，則會包含表示路由名稱的字串。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the name of the route, if contains a route key named RouteName.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 將運算式剖析為路由索引鍵和值的集合，並且選擇性地剖析為路由名稱。

span.span: Parses an expression into a collection of route keys and values, and optionally into a route name.

returns.span: 如果剖析成功則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if parsing was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中移除前置和尾端空格運算式，然後將它分割成索引鍵/值組，使用逗號做為分隔符號來。The method strips leading and trailing spaces from the expression, and then splits it into key/value pairs by using commas as delimiters. 如果名為路由索引鍵`RouteName`找到，則值會傳遞回到`routeName`參數而不在`routeValues`。If the route key named `RouteName` is found, that value is passed back in the `routeName` parameter and not in `routeValues`. 否則，請`null`會傳回`routeName`。Otherwise, `null` is returned for `routeName`. 前置和尾端空格也會一併移除從個別的索引鍵和值。Leading and trailing spaces are also stripped from individual keys and values. 方法會傳回`false`如果至少一個索引鍵/值組的格式，不包含運算式*金鑰*`=`*值*，並使用逗號不同的多個配對。The method returns `false` if the expression is not composed of at least one key/value pair that is in the format *key*`=`*value*, and that uses commas to separate multiple pairs.
